name: BIG BADA BOOM
description:
Play as Temperance Keywood, Psy-powered warden of Psycell Prison, as she attempts to prevent the escape attempts of Explode-o-maniac, Clay Moore. To put him down she will first have to fight her way through his horde of volatile minions - each of which is capable of tearing her to shreads in an erruption of explosive fury. Will she even be able to weild her mental powers and survive the onrush of these violent, criminal creations? That is where you come in.

Welcome to Big Bada Boom!

Have fun.
